attributes.action: Ban puppy farms and have harsher sentencing for puppy farming in the UK.
attributes.additional_details:
References to videos showing harshness of puppy farming. 
*WARNING GRAPHIC*
https://www.facebook.com/RSPCA/videos/10155482127088047/
In general the punishments for puppy farming are bans for keeping animals and suspended sentences both of which are not harsh enough. This will not prevent people from earning as much as £100 million a year from this sick trade.  
Puppy farming should hold a prison sentence.
attributes.background: Puppy farming in the U.K is getting more profitable each year due to the lack of knowledge people have on the topic and due to laws not being harsh enough. Countless videos show how awful conditions are and things must change, no animal deserves a life of misery and cruelty.
